com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core

Class Mower

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core.Mower

  • public class Mower
extends Object
    Created by v.segouin on 07/09/2016. This class is the main controller of the mower behaviour. It is also the main entry point of the whole program. It control the wheels, servomotor and the detector and keep it consistent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mower(int initialAbscissa, int initialOrdinate, Direction initialDirection, MapArea map)
      Standard constructor, will the mower at the given coordinates.
      Mower(MapArea map)
      Basic constructor, will place the mower at 0,0,N.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String drawPosition()
      draw the current state of the mower and the map in a string, can be used on CLI.
      Detector getDetector() 
      String getStatistics()
      Give the globals statistics of the mower.
      void goBackward()
      Will perform a check on the asked action and will move backward if there is no obstacle.
      void goForward()
      Will perform a check on the asked action and will move forward if there is no obstacle.
      void turnLeft()
      Ask the servomotor to turn left.
      void turnRight()
      Ask the servomotor to turn right.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mower

        public Mower(MapArea map)
        Basic constructor, will place the mower at 0,0,N.
        Parameters:
        map - the map where to place the mower

      • Mower

        public Mower(int initialAbscissa,
             int initialOrdinate,
             Direction initialDirection,
             MapArea map)
        Standard constructor, will the mower at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        initialAbscissa - the abscissa where to place the mower
        initialOrdinate - the ordinate where to place the mower
        initialDirection - the direction where the mower have to face at start
        map - the map where to place the mower

    • Method Detail

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft()
        Ask the servomotor to turn left.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight()
        Ask the servomotor to turn right.

      • goForward

        public void goForward()
               throws UnsafeMoveException
        Will perform a check on the asked action and will move forward if there is no obstacle.
        Throws:
        UnsafeMoveException - if an obstacle is detected

      • goBackward

        public void goBackward()
                throws UnsafeMoveException
        Will perform a check on the asked action and will move backward if there is no obstacle.
        Throws:
        UnsafeMoveException - if an obstacle is detected

      • drawPosition

        public String drawPosition()
        draw the current state of the mower and the map in a string, can be used on CLI.
        Returns:
        the string where the positions are drawed

      • getStatistics

        public String getStatistics()
        Give the globals statistics of the mower.
        Returns:
        a string containing the global statistics of the mower.

        public Detector getDetector()
